subclassFeature.name: Oath of Sanctuary
entries: Paladins who swear the Oath of Sanctuary dedicate themselves to the protection of the weak, the preservation of life, and the maintenance of peace. They believe that a true warrior is not one who seeks battle, but one who stands firm in defense of those who cannot protect themselves. These paladins use their divine gifts to create sanctuaries of safety and peace wherever they tread, shielding others from harm and bringing calm to even the most dangerous situations.

subclassFeature.name: Tenets of Sanctuary
entries: The tenets of the Oath of Sanctuary emphasize the protection of life and the pursuit of peace above all else. Paladins who swear this oath abide by these core principles:

entries.name: Shield the Weak
entries: Defend those who cannot defend themselves. Stand as the last line of defense between the innocent and those who seek to do harm.

entries.name: Preserve Life
entries: Violence should only be a last resort. Wherever possible, seek to resolve conflict without bloodshed.

entries.name: Embody Peace
entries: Let your presence calm the storm. Through your actions, show the world that peace is not only possible but attainable.

subclassFeature.name: Oath Spells
entries: You gain oath spells at the paladin levels listed.

entries.caption: Oath of Sanctuary Spells
rows: {@spell beacon of hope}, {@spell protection from energy}
{@spell aura of purity}, {@spell guardian of faith}
{@spell circle of power}, {@spell dispel evil and good}

subclassFeature.name: Channel Divinity: Aegis of Calm
entries: You can use your Channel Divinity to project an aura of calm and peace. As an action, you present your holy symbol and all creatures of your choice within 30 feet must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is calmed, becoming unable to attack or take hostile actions for 1 minute. The effect ends if the creature is attacked or harmed. On a successful save, the creature is unaffected.

subclassFeature.name: Channel Divinity: Sanctuary's Grace
entries: As an action, you can use your Channel Divinity to create a 20-foot radius area of sanctuary centered on yourself. For 1 minute, any creature of your choice within this radius gains resistance to all damage. Hostile creatures within this area have disadvantage on attack rolls.

subclassFeature.name: Aura of Peace
entries: Starting at 7th level, you emit a calming aura while you are not incapacitated. You and friendly creatures within 10 feet of you can’t be charmed and have advantage on saving throws against being frightened. At 18th level, the range of this aura increases to 30 feet.

subclassFeature.name: Impenetrable Bastion
entries: At 15th level, you become a bastion of protection. When an ally within 10 feet of you is hit with an attack, you can use your reaction to impose disadvantage on the attack roll, potentially causing the attack to miss. Additionally, you gain resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks.

subclassFeature.name: Seraph of Sanctuary
entries: At 20th level, you can assume the form of a divine protector, taking on an angelic appearance. Using your action, you undergo a transformation for 1 minute, gaining the following benefits:

items: Wings sprout from your back, granting you a flying speed of 60 feet.
Allies within 30 feet of you are under the effects of the {@spell sanctuary} spell while you remain within range.
You have resistance to all damage.

entries: Once you use this feature, you can’t use it again until you finish a long rest.
